channel.title: ▓▒░the demise's compilation░▒▓
channel.description:
[font=Algerian][size=50pt][b]THE DEMISE COMPILATION[/b][/font] [font=Algerian][size=90pt][b]CLIENTS[/b][/font]
[u][font=Algerian][size=15pt][b]100% 508 character and NPC conversion client.[/b][/font] [size=15pt][font=Algerian][b]NEW 508 CONVERSION CLIENT. 100% ALL FIXED BUGS[/b][/font][/size][/u]
[font=Algerian][size=20pt][b]DOWNLOAD: http://uppit.com/v/AFLCJK14.[/b][/size][/font] [font=Algerian][size=20pt][b]DOWNLOAD FOR OLDER SOURCES: http://uppit.com/v/2D6PWO9A.[/b][/size][/font]
[b]Ok, ive fixed up a few bugs from the last client, and now these 508 models on a 317 are 100%.[/b]
Theres [b]no more 2h stance glitches[/b], scimitar/ longsword glitches and [b]ive gotten rid of most rubbish graphics[/b]. Although, [b]there are some new features[/b].
[font=Algerian][size=15pt][b]Full features list.[/b][/size][/font]
100% [b]J Frame, Item ID List, NPC ID List and Object ID List.[/b]
508 characters including girls are now included. [b]This features all hairstyles.[/b]
All [b]Iron/Steel/Mithril/Adamant/Rune/Dragon armors[/b] are now 508.
[b]All PvP armors[/b] are now included with 100% rotation
Other various customs are included, as well as [b]dragon claws, full arma and full bandos.[/b]
It now connects for [b]EVERY server, not just old deltas.[/b]
It now has [b]flames on the client and a new background.[/b]
Its graphics allow [b]full customision for every server.[/b]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/11inxqf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/eg6eqv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/1zp411k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/el8q3p.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/27wrvqd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/15804uo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2s6kqbc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2qwltlc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/11tpgfl.png[/img]
[u][font=Algerian][size=15pt][b]PvP Evo Adapted Client[/b][/size][/font][/u] [font=Algerian][size=20pt][b]DOWNLOAD: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VFYWYMD1[/b][/size][/font]
HD right click interface (like runescape)
When applied with the correct emotes (server sided) teles work exactly like rs.
Godsword stances when running, walking, blocking and standing
3D hp bars to replace those horrible red n green ones
Non excessively used customs, only customs included are the most popular, E.G death cape, donor cape, vesta, stat and all pvp armors.
Actual runescape background
When you click run the horrible server thing doesnt appear, just the java
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/35mf5ep.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/3129zzb.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/30cc93d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/x4f6vl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/wtvuc7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/nzg0fn.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/s4nju0.png[/img]
[font=Algerian][size=90pt][b]SERVERS[/b][/font][/size]
[b][size=20pt][font=Algerian]Demise Pking - Perfect DDS And Oh So Much More![/font][/size][/b] [b][size=20pt][font=Algerian]DOWNLOAD CLIENT: http://uppit.com/v/IRXN4233[/font][/size][/b] [b][size=20pt][font=Algerian]DOWNLOAD SERVER: http://uppit.com/v/UHD9V532[/font][/size][/b]
[b]100% Runescape DDS special[/b] with perfectly timed hits!
[b]Perfect godsword running, walking, attacking and defending[/b] emotes.
100% [b]Godsword Making System![/b]
Run with gs [b]has been altered somewhat[/b] to make it [b]more fluent[/b] and so you dont look like a dickhead when you run bout xD. Looks much better tbh.
[b]100% non glitchy 508 char models[/b] 100% compatible.
[b]All PvP armors[/b] with correct bonus's.
[b]Statius and vesta ALMOST correct specials.[/b]
New [b]awesome veng[/b] to replace the crappy delta one :o
New [b]shops.[/b]
[b]Custom NPC's[/b] :D. Eg "Demise's Trainer". (just edit class9 on the client to change it)
The one and only server to have [b]PK Leveling[/b]. You gain pk experience every time you kill someone and can be implemented into items!
PvP points [b]based on cash, wilderness bonus and combat level.[/b]
[b]New DEATH system![/b] instead of dying and lieing on the floor like a fool you teleport home on death, dropping your items before you go!
Got rid of PvP drops. They got boring.
New [b]shops and KBD :o![/b]
Only the best customs. [b]All 100% Ints.[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/25fq6nc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sgjuz6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/inbv53.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1253nlx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/mmc004.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/dqkxg7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/dr9rac.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2n6rtpi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ff5ulv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mcub68.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1zd3bx5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2s7ay2t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2iij3og.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vo0mpt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/efkljt.png[/img]
DDS [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1109e36.gif[/img]
GS Making [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29vdyfb.gif[/img]
Awesome Vengeance! [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/f2j3uo.gif[/img]
New Death! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9u12s2.gif[/img]
[font=Algerian][size=15pt][b]PvP Evo Based Demise Pking[/b][/size][/font] [font=Algerian][size=20pt][b]DOWNLOAD Client: http://uppit.com/v/OH6RNN1N[/b][/size][/font] [font=Algerian][size=20pt][b]DOWNLOAD server: http://uppit.com/v/32G3ADEJ[/b][/size][/font] [b]100% perfect ints[/b] for most items. Exactly like runescapes.
Perfect runescape right click and rollover on a 317
Changed textures for [b]floors, lavacapes and water.[/b]
Customised drag weps, i like them.
Moving Water
Full Elite and [b]PVP Armors with perfect ints.[/b]
Edited to [b]reduce lagg when the server is running[/b]
[b][size=15pt]Server Sided[/size][/b]
Perfect [b]PVP Point and Kills System.[/b]
Pvp points appear instead of quest points, and [b]kills appear in the bottom right.[/b]
Full [b]PVP world.[/b]
Perfect Combat With [b]Range Follow, Mage Follow And Melle follow.[/b]
100% [b]Balanced combat, edited ALOT.[/b]
Pest control 100% with lovely interfaces :)
Pest control rewards
Random PVP Drops that appear sometimes as well as your drop to gain PVP armor.
[b]A buy X Option[/b]
[b]Ive done so much more but these are the only things I can remember atm.. soz.[/b]

[size=20pt][font=Algerian][b]100% Duel Based Server[/b][/font][/size]
[size=20pt][font=Algerian][b]Download: http://uppit.com/v/Z4AU8UMS Download Client: http://uppit.com/v/AFLCJK14[/b][/font][/size]
Full [b]Dueling[/b]
Full [b]Staking[/b]
100% [b]duel points, win points and lose points.[/b]
Modified dueling [b]to make it less glitchy[/b], although there are still some glitches.
Added some [b]dueling rules[/b] and made them work.
::pvp checks your duel points, wins and losses.
::getpvp checks another persons duel points wins and losses.
